rooms.name: Living Room & Lounge
rooms.description: Large, open space with a Bohemian decor style incorporating earthy colors, textured fabrics and eclectic art. Features include built-in seating areas and an entertainment unit.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with natural light and minimalistic Bohemian touches; includes walk-in closet and a private bathroom adjacent to the room.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. The decor features bohemian elements such as vintage furniture and wall art that reflects local cultural influences.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for a secondary occupant or guest, incorporating Bohemian accents and sufficient storage solutions.

rooms.name: Study Room/Office
rooms.description: Quiet study area with ample natural light, equipped with ergonomic furniture and decor inspired by local art motifs.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness room featuring essential gym equipment arranged in a functional layout. Large windows ensure ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles for promoting health and energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an open design that merges into the dining area; includes ample storage and worktop space. Decor elements are inspired by local craft and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Cozy dining area integrated with the kitchen for family meals, decorated with vibrant Bohemian art pieces and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spare bedroom designed to accommodate guests, featuring a simple yet elegant layout with Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Bathroom(s)
rooms.description: Primary bathrooms shared among the bedrooms; includes modern fixtures and natural stone finishes in accordance with local aesthetics.

openings.details: Large entrance door with secure locking system, complemented by a small foyer for transitional space.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light and provide panoramic views of the garden.
Interior doors designed to allow flexibility in the layout, with soundproofing where needed.
Small balconies or verandas that connect the interior spaces with the garden and offer a refreshing view of the surroundings.

levels.description: This 4BHK Bohemian townhouse is designed on a 30x50 feet plot with a large garden. The design integrates Vastu principles by aligning key rooms such as the master bedroom and private gym in favorable directions (east for entrance and north for living spaces) while ensuring a west-facing orientation of the overall structure to harness natural light during the day. Bohemian design elements are featured throughout, creating an inviting atmosphere that blends modern functionality with traditional cultural motifs.
